meanings.sent1: The electronic device measured the current in millivolts.
meanings.sent2: The battery output was only a few millivolts.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally zapped myself with a tiny millivolt of electricity!
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like a sudden surge of a millivolt in a calm sea.
meanings.sent5: The dim light bulb flickered with just a millivolt of power.

meanings.definition: A unit of electromotive force equal to one thousandth of a volt.
meanings.sent1: The sensor detected a fluctuation of millivolts in the circuit.
meanings.sent2: The power supply delivered a stable millivolt reading.
meanings.sent3: The tiny robot ran on a millivolt of energy, moving slowly.
meanings.sent4: His smile lit up the room like a bright millivolt of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze felt like a soft millivolt caressing the skin.
